title: Sam Smith on his struggles with body image: 'It’s always going to be a battle in my head'
text: Ronda Rousey Has a Message for Body Shamers 00:53 Ronda Rousey may be the UFC women's bantamweight champion, but that doesn't protect her from the harsh words of her haters, particularly those who body shame her. In a recent interview with the New York Times, Rousey dished on her personal struggles with body image and said with the utmost... You Might Like
